    Virtualhost Apache SSL

    Exemplu elementar de virtualhost Apache cu SSL <VirtualHost *:443> DocumentRoot "/var/www/html/domain/" ServerName domain.com ServerAlias domain.com LogLevel error ErrorLog logs/domain-ssl-error_log CustomLog logs/domain-ssl-access_log combined SSLEngine on SSLCertificateFile "/etc/httpd/conf/cert/domain.com.crt" SSLCertificateChainFile "/etc/httpd/conf/cert/domain-bundle.crt" SSLCertificateKeyFile "/etc/httpd/conf/sslkey/domain.key"...
